_sText:
aim_pasture - Aim/Fun featuring AK47 and M4A1
by Team PDL (gloupide.com)
Mapping and Texturing : Dawa and Julio
Modeling : Dawa

Tips :
There are 2 AWP snipes available.
- "Use" the piece of wood under the crow in the cabin.
- Jump over the sheeps to reach the roof of the shelter.
If you kill the sheeps or make the crow fly away, no AWP for you Smile

Action won't begin until you hear the "FIGHT!" sound
Special Thanks to :
All members of the team PDL for support
Kubix and Small_Suno for 3D help
Players of the Gloupide server for testing and feedback

Visit us at http://gloupide.com
Please send feedback and comments to:
pdl.mapping@gloupide.com
